title: Drawing, "Five designs for various structures for a villa"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
inscribed:
Center left: fontana di/ villa
Center right: caffeaus
Bottom left: porta di villa
Bottom right: Pianta della/ porta di villa (PDM'91)
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Five designs for various structures for a villa".
Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-1185.
